changeSet.author: Wube
changeSet.sql: create table odos_crrs_svc.conf_sched ( conf_sch_id serial not null, conf_rm_id int not null references odos_crrs_svc.conf_rm (conf_rm_id), req_id int not null, start_dttm date not null, ednt_dttm date not null, conf_title varchar(200) not null, primary key (conf_sch_id) );
